text: yaqinan Allah taâ€™ala ne apne Rasool(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) ko qaab saccha dikhaaya ke InshaAllah tum yaqinan pure aman wa amaan ke saath masjid haraam mein daakhil hoge, sar mondawaate hoye aur sar ke baal katar waate hoye (chayn ke saath) niddar ho kar, wo un umoor ko jaanta hai jinhe tum nahi jaante, pas us ne is se pehle ek nazdeek ki fateh tumhe mayassar ki
